title: (x) Is this font digital available? "forum flare" - pre-digital University Roman w/ swashes {Nick Cooke, Steve M}
content:
Hello,  
It comes from here;  
 [http://typophile.com/node/2833](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045337/http:/typophile.com/node/2833 "http://typophile.com/node/2833")

That topic has some grat scans,

pleas, could someone tell me if is this avalaible?

[http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25117.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045337/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25117.gif "http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25117.gif")

or what font could be similar...  
Thanks anyway
author: dreverb

comments.content: The 2nd one seems to be a swashed version of University Roman.

This new and improved version of University Roman includes many free-flowing swash alternatives that give designers more freedom for experimentation.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/university-roman/regular/character...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045337/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/university-roman/regular/characters.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/university-roman/regular/characters.html")
Yep - and I still hate it.

Thanks

hate? It's not that bad.. :)
